    Welcome to Facebok Task Manager Beta

    Project

    Click the new button on the top dashboard to get started. Manage your daily and weekly tasks, create projects, and customize the background and a profile pic to your liking.

    Key:
    Click the star to mark a task complete
    Edit the due date as needed
    Click the project button to add or edit the project
    Click the checkbox to set a 24hr reminder
    The "none" button is the task priority, toggle between High, Medium, and Low
    Click the "X" to delete a task.

    Future updoats to include profile editing and login capabilities. In the meantime, feel free to save tasks locally.
